data.title: Do you know why Bruce Willis didn't play in "Titanic"?
data.text:
Looking 4 a movie I think star Bruce Willis with the villian having him on clock

Looking 4 a movie I think star Bruce Willis with the villian having him on clock to solve riddles,Mignt star Samuel l Jackson or someone mm is getting killed. At least like 10 years old

Dwayne Johnson and Bruce Willis are confirmed for "G.I. Joe 2" GO JOE

Okay, I know I'm a bit late posting this, but I figured why not now? Anyway, in recent news, it looks like Bruce Willis and Dwayne "The Rock" Johnson will be in the next G.I. Joe live action film to kick a** and take names along with the American heroes. Anyway, what are your...

Arnold Schwarzenneger and Bruce Willis are back in Expendables 2

in recent news, arnold schwarzenneger and bruce willis are set to reprise their respected roles in "Expendables 2", as their roles are allegedly MORE substantial than the previous film. Your thoughts?

Tebow should have job

The Titans, Bills and Jags need QB help. I hope this creates an opportunity to see Tebow play this year.

What is the meanest thing anyone has ever said to you?
